class.rdfs:comment: A technical article - Example: How-to (task) topics, step-by-step, procedural troubleshooting, specifications, etc.
class.rdfs:label: TechArticle

schema:dependencies.rdfs:comment: Prerequisites needed to fulfill steps in article.
schema:dependencies.rdfs:label: dependencies

schema:proficiencyLevel.rdfs:comment: Proficiency needed for this content; expected values: 'Beginner', 'Expert'.
